questions: Can you walk us through your experience with designing, developing, and supporting Microsoft SQL Server 2008, 8R2, and 2012?
How have you utilized Joins, Set Operators, Temporary Tables, Table Variables, CTE/Derived Tables, and sub-Queries in your work?
Can you provide examples of your experience in constructing Tables, Views, Indexes, Synonyms, Functions, Cursors, and Stored Procedures in SQL Server?
How have you used ETL tools like SSIS, Bulk Insert, and BCP for Data Extraction, Transformation, and Loading in your projects?
What is your experience with designing and developing SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS) packages, including control flow tasks like Data Flow Task and For Loop Container?
How have you implemented different transformations like Data Conversion, Conditional Split, Merge, Merge Join, and Union All in your SSIS packages?
Can you discuss your approach to providing Logging and Error Handling in SSIS packages using Event Handler, Checkpoints, and logging techniques?
How have you designed and deployed various types of reports using SSRS, including features like Group-by, Drill-Down, Parameterized Reports, and Report builder?
Can you explain your process for Deploying SSIS Packages and SSRS reports, as well as updating information based on business logic using SQL Server Agent and Windows Scheduler?
How have you applied your knowledge of SQL Profiler, performance tuning, Query tuning, and new features in advanced versions of SQL Server in your projects?
